reg_info.act_under: Audiology and Speech-Language Pathology Act, 1991   Loi de 1991 sur les audiologistes et les orthophonistes

content.content: 1.In this Regulation, “non-Council member” means a member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1.In this Regulation,

“non-Council member” means a member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 1.

content.content: 2.(1)The Executive Committee shall be composed of, (a) the President, Vice-President, Treasurer and Secretary of the Council; (b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and (c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. (2)The President of the Council shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2.(1)The Executive Committee shall be composed of,

(a) the President, Vice-President, Treasurer and Secretary of the Council;

(b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and

(c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

(2)The President of the Council shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 2.

content.content: 3.The Registration Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; and (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3.The Registration Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; and

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 3.

content.content: 4.The Complaints Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4.The Complaints Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 4.

content.content: 5.The Discipline Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 5.
content.raw_html:
5.The Discipline Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 5.

content.content: 6.The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 6.
content.raw_html:
6.The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 6.

content.content: 7.The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 7.
content.raw_html:
7.The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 7.

content.content: 8.The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 8.
content.raw_html:
8.The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one non-Council member. O. Reg. 671/93, s. 8.
